net.powermatcher.api.data

Class MarketBasis

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.powermatcher.api.data.MarketBasis

  • public class MarketBasis
extends java.lang.Object
    MarketBasis is an immutable data object specifying the settings for the market. This includes the price range, the commodity being exchanges, the currency being used and the number of price steps used in the demand arrays.

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • MarketBasis

        public MarketBasis(java.lang.String commodity,
           java.lang.String currency,
           int priceSteps,
           double minimumPrice,
           double maximumPrice)
        A constructor used to create an instance of this class.
        Parameters:
        commodity - the commodity that is to be handled by this market.
        currency - the 3 character currency code.
        priceSteps - the number of price steps used when converting a PointBid to an ArrayBid
        minimumPrice - the minimum price that is valid in this market (inclusive)
        maximumPrice - the maximum price that is valid in this market (inclusive)
